name: SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #9
description: The S.A.N.W.S office or offices in Indianapolis and/or Bristol and Jackson have issued a SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #9 at 4:04PM EST. Primary threats to expect include large hail and wind gusts up to 80MPH, and even a tornado or two. Impact: expect damage to vehicles, homes, powerlines, outdoor objects, and outdoor animals. This SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #9 will expire at 11:25PM EST on the 1st.

name: SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #10
description: The S.A.N.W.S office or offices in Lubbock and/or Texarkana have issued a SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #10 at 4:18PM EST. Primary threats to expect include large hail and wind gusts up to 80MPH, and even a tornado or two. Impact: expect damage to vehicles, homes, powerlines, outdoor objects, and outdoor animals. This SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #10 will expire at 11:25PM EST on the 1st.
